product_name: Amphipod ArmPod SmartView Sumo Armband - Pink
long_description: Sporting a larger pouch for the latest smartphone designs, the bright pink SmartView Sumo provides easy on-the-go access and touch screen control while you walk, run or blaze local hiking trails.
